amuse.scheduler
Class Scheduler

java.lang.Object
  amuse.scheduler.Scheduler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Scheduler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

Scheduler is a central component of the Amuse. It can be started either from the command line or from GUI. Scheduler delegates the Amuse tasks (e.g. feature extraction or classification) to the corresponding nodes. The configurations of tasks can be given as TaskConfiguration class or as String with path to Arff configuration file.

Version:
$Id: Scheduler.java 1092 2010-07-01 14:09:34Z vatolkin $
Author:
Igor Vatolkin
